snippet: Mayor Martin Walsh of Boston said that public school officials and teachers’ union leaders had agreed to add 40 minutes to the school day....

headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: Boston to Extend School Day
headline.main: Massachusetts: Boston to Extend School Day

lead_paragraph: Mayor Martin Walsh of Boston said that public school officials and teachers’ union leaders had agreed to add 40 minutes to the school day.
abstract: Boston public school officials and teachers’ unions have agreed to add 40 minutes to the school day, move aimed at improving students' learning.
